thread.section_title: Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: emmanuelagawu
title: Excellent
text: The rooms are of a high standard. I had the opportunity of staying both in the original rooms and renovated ones and both are well maintained. The staff are well trained and very professional. The staff are client-oriented and show flexibility in meeting the needs of clients e.g. staff in the restaurant agreed to serve me and my guests though we arrived just at that time they were about to close the restaurant.
